panels.content:
This site is a collection of graphs showcasing the bike counts from the counters set up by the City along with some weather data from Environment Canada. The data is automatically scrapped once a day from the respective sites.

### Graphs

* [Counts and Weather](https://calgary.bike/grafana/dashboard/db/counts-and-weather) - Daily counts and the high for the day
* [Trending Averages](https://calgary.bike/grafana/dashboard/db/trending-averages) - Rolling monthly average for each counter.
* [Individual Daily Graphs](https://calgary.bike/grafana/dashboard/db/individual-daily-graphs) - Each installation measured in trips/hr.
* [Cumulative Counts](https://calgary.bike/grafana/dashboard/db/cumulative-counts) - Cumulative totals since January 1, 2015.
* [Data Examples](https://calgary.bike/grafana/dashboard/db/data-examples) - Counts from each installation with hourly weather informations.

For more details on what data is available please check out the [README on GitHub](https://github.com/Chealion/yycbike/blob/master/README.md)

### Thanks

Thanks to the [City of Calgary](http://calgary.ca/bikedata), Eco-Counter, and [Environment Canada]() for making the data available.

### Sources

* [Calgary Bike Counter Page](http://www.eco-public.com/ParcPublic/?id=4190)
* [Peace Bridge - Bikes and Pedestrians](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100018487)
* [Stephen Ave](http://eco-public.com/public2/?id=100020207)
* [7th St.](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100017181)
* 5th St. - [North Leg](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100022540), [Under the Tracks](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100020095), [South Leg](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100022541)
* 12th Ave. - [West Leg](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100022581), [Central Memorial](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100022580), [East Leg](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100022582)
* 8th Ave. - [West Leg](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100024297), [Centre](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100024406)
* 9th Ave. - [NMC](http://www.eco-public.com/public2/?id=100023675)

### Technology

The graphs are generated by [Grafana](http://grafana.org/) with Graphite/Whisper being used as the data store, and Python scripts to scrape the data. Scripts and how it is set up is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/chealion/yycbike).

There are a couple caveats; Grafana will sometimes bin results so the daily counts are off by 1 or 2 and the extra 1 or 2 are in they day before or day after. The other is that while the dashboards are set to correct for the browser - daylight savings time means the hourly and 15 minutes graphs appear an hour earlier than reality. (MDT = -6, instead of -7).

### Contact

Question, Concerns, etc.?

Twitter: [@Chealion](http://twitter.com/Chealion)  
micheal+yycbike@mcjones.ca
